official.headline: Transitions in Leadership
official.anchor_line: City networks stabilize as a new oversight protocol is activated across Stenograd.
official.contextual_reframing: Automated succession ensures uninterrupted governance and optimal city function.

official.headline: Voices Engage System
official.anchor_line: Citizens gather peacefully to interact with city displays and receive updated guidance.
official.contextual_reframing: Open dialogue with city infrastructure supports harmony and collective progress.

official.headline: Halden AI Addresses City
official.anchor_line: AI persona Halden now communicates daily with residents, offering guidance and reflections.
official.contextual_reframing: Stenograd's adaptive systems evolve to provide transparent, accessible support in changing times.

underground.headline: System Glitches Loom
underground.anchor_line: City screens stutter and blackout as leadership scrambles for control.
underground.contextual_reframing: Rumors say no one is really steering. Eyes open. Trust nothing you see on state displays.

underground.headline: Advice or Control?
underground.anchor_line: Crowds debate AI guidance that pops up everywhere, offering apologies and riddles instead of answers.
underground.contextual_reframing: Is this help, confession, or a new lie? Every word from Halden's ghost is tracked. Engagement means you're scored.

underground.headline: BCI Scores Shift Again
underground.anchor_line: Halden's AI now talks daily. Some call it hope, others call it a trap.
underground.contextual_reframing: Talk to it, ignore it, protest it either way your future is recalculated. Stenograd's new era begins in silence and suspicion.
